display_long_description:
[media]                                                                                                                                 

**Get full game:**

**meta.com/experiences/6847023095354894**

Join Discord:  **discord.gg/hsvr (horror simulator vr)** to win rewards!

[media]

The gameplay combines **Phasmophobia** & **Lethal Company**, that becomes one of the most popular Multiplayer Horror games.


# ☠️Play with squad, hunt or be hunted (Easy Peasy!)
- **Find Haunted Room:** Use flashlight to spot floating cursed objects, listen for creepy whispers… is the ghost room nearby?

- **Sacramentals**: Throw Holy Water to reveal demon shadows! Hold a Crucifix to track demon footsteps! Lots of tools to play with!
[media]

- **Seal the Demon**: Solve puzzles to learn demon’s name. Put right sacramentals on the altar. Hurry! If you’re too slow, the demon goes CRAZY!

- **RUN OR HIDE**: Hide in closets, slam doors, or blast the demon with Bible, so SATISFYING!
[media]


# ☠️Why So Fun?
- **Physical Interactions**: Push open cabinet doors, answer phone calls, play the piano... explore freely!
- **Voice Chat**: Communicate with teammates while running. After being hunted down, become a spirit to give clues!
- **Coin Frenzy**: Earn coins by completing missions. Buy teddy bear masks, angel-wing Avatars and dress up as the coolest demon hunter!

# ☠️FREE Version? Still AWESOME!
- **Classic Mode**- For all-night multiplayer sessions!
- **Join Discord to unlock Crazy Mode** - Battle 10 dynamic demon abilities!
[media]

# ☠️If You're Addicted to...
The heart-pounding chase from **Animal Company, Noclip VR, and Yeeps** - our dynamic hunting system will make your adrenaline surge! Demons can climb, break through doors, and even ambush in disguise.
